content: **the latest version is people_v3** v3-05/02/26 revised the instructions to clarify the chart working order merged the pattern text and chart pdfs into a single file people_v3 pdf v2-18/02/23 corrected sec 5 r1 chart_v4-18/02/23 corrected these parts of chart page 11 stitch 40 and 41 of row 1 page 12 stitch 40 and 41 of row 1 page 14 stitch 87 and 10 of row 1 page 16 stitch 29 and 50 of row 7 to 18 chart_v3-04/02/22 corrected chart on page3 and 5 3ページと5ページのchartを修正しました chart_v2-25/01/22 added japanese to the legend chartの1ページ目の編み図記号に日本語を追記しました **people** has cables and slits on both sides it is worked top-down in the round seamlessly **yarn** puppy british eroika 50g / 82m / 100% wool col 101 1148m / 700g **needles** 4 5mm/jp8 circular needle 4 2mm/jp7 circular needle **gauge** 25sts and 22rows = 10cm in twisted rib pattern with 4 5mm/jp8 needle **size** one size finished body circumference approximately 120cm **technique** german short row
